title: The real problem with U.S. marijuana regulation 'not from federal illegality,' WeedMaps CEO says - Yahoo Finance
content:
1. The real problem with U.S. marijuana regulation 'not from federal illegality,' WeedMaps CEO says  Yahoo Finance
  2. House votes to decriminalize marijuana at federal level  Fox News
  3. Texas' Henry Cuellar one of two Democrats to vote against landmark marijuana legalization bill  KRGV
  4. House set to vote on marijuana legalization bill Friday  WPTV News - FL Palm Beaches and Treasure Coast
  5. House passes bill to federally decriminalize marijuana  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: While the passage of the MORE Act would certainly expand cannabis markets in the U.S., Weedmaps CEO Chris Beals thinks that a bigger obstacle lies in the 37 states where the substance is already legal for adult use.
